author: Reuters Editorial
title: 'Just one case': fears coronavirus may spread like wildfire in world's refugee camps
description: In the world’s largest refugee settlement in Bangladesh, filmmaker Mohammed Arafat has been making public safety videos to warn about the dangers of coronavirus.
content:
(Reuters) - In the world’s largest refugee settlement in Bangladesh, filmmaker Mohammed Arafat has been making public safety videos to warn about the dangers of coronavirus. 
The 25-year-old is worried that the disease will devastate the vast, crowded camps … [+9978 chars]
